# Korea Weather Data EDA (in progress)

- Source of data is [here](https://data.kma.go.kr/data/grnd/selectAsosRltmList.do?pgmNo=36)

- Information provided includes:
    - Temperature
    - precipitation
    - Wind
    - Atmospheric pressure
    - Humidity
    - Solar radiation
    - Sunlight
    - Snow
    - Cloud
    ...
